nodes.text: Pell was a male Nautolan pilot and a sergeant of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. During the Battle of Ilum in 3640 BBY Pell's starfighter crashed in the Flatlands region of Ilum. Pell send his astromech droid L4-B5 to the Republic base camp, where the droid convinced a Republic citizen to find the wreckage of their starfighter and provide Pell with medical aid.
Sergeant Pell appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic during the mission "Pilot Down."
